text: Henry "Hank" Blade (April 28, 1921 â€“ February 8, 2003) was a Canadian professional ice hockey centre that played 24 games in the National Hockey League with the Chicago Black Hawks. Blade also played for the Ottawa Commandos and Ottawa Senators of the QSHL, Kansas City Pla-Mors and Milwaukee Sea Gulls of the USHL, Pittsburgh Hornets of the AHL and Calgary Stampeders of the PCHL and the WHL. He died on February 8, 2003. ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Peterborough, Ontario
title: Hank Blade
